it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.gui

Class ClientMediator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.gui.ClientMediator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class ClientMediator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Mediator class for the GUI. After a new Client object is created we can then use it to send commands and requests to the server though this singleton class from arcoss the GUI Panels.
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio
